meanings.sent1: The unbelted jacket flapped in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She drove unbelted, risking her safety.
meanings.sent3: The unbelted pants kept falling down comically.
meanings.sent4: His unbelted emotions spilled out uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The unbelted rollercoaster ride was thrilling but dangerous.

meanings.sent1: The unbelted child bounced around in the car.
meanings.sent3: The unbelted teddy bear flew out the window playfully.
meanings.sent5: The unbelted astronaut floated weightlessly in space.

meanings.sent1: The unbelted bag kept opening and spilling its contents.
meanings.sent2: The unbelted door swung open unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: The unbelted suitcase refused to stay closed.
meanings.sent4: His unbelted sword slipped from its sheath.
meanings.sent5: The unbelted dress flowed freely in the breeze.
